title: A Relaxing Eco-Retreat at New Zealand’s Premier Sustainable Property
description: Embrace the ultimate eco-friendly getaway at Camp Glenorchy, a sustainable retreat located in one of New Zealand’s most pristine destinations, only 45-minutes from Queenstown. Breathe in fresh mountain air, take in stunning alpine scenery and experience a simpler way of life. Whether you’re dreaming of a couples’ or group holiday, Camp Glenorchy is sure to be the ideal location for nature-lovers of all kinds. Get back to nature on this unforgettable escape and enjoy a gourmet dinner hamper and guaranteed 1pm late checkout.
